ans_forgive: %s %s Oh all right. I forgive you.
ans_self_boop: %s My creator said I shouldn't do that. %s
ans_fanta_list: There's no wrong way to Fanta size.
♪♫ Is this real life, is this just Fanta sea? ♫♪

I dreamt I was drowning in an ocean of orange soda. 
Thank Celestia it was only a Fanta sea.

When I drink alcohol people call me an alcoholic but when I drink Fanta... 
Nobody calls me or texts me. Guys, I'm lonely.

Soaking a twig in Coke is nice, but soaking a twig in Fanta? 
... Fanta stick.
ans_meme1:
%s So you want to be a Meme Master? 
You should know that there are hidden dangers waiting for you there.
There is nothing I can do to help you...
If you really want to be a Meme Master, mention me with "I REALLY want to be a Meme Master"
and I will try to find a way to let you in.
ans_meme2:
%s You have sealed your destiny!
I will use my special powers to open the gateway between here and the memes.
Behold the horrors, greater than what lives in the Everfree forest...
BEHOLD! Bronies in the wild!!!
%s BIIZAAAAAMM!!!
ans_meme_error: %s I'm sorry, something went wrong with my circuitry. %s
ans_meme_already: %s You're already well on the way to become a Meme Master
ans_next_gala1: %s Next Galacon is from August 1st to August 2nd 2020! Hype!!!
ans_next_gala2: %s days, %s hours, %s minutes and %s seconds left! IT TAKES FOREVERHHH
ans_best_pony3: %s A bizaam isn't a pony, silly...
ans_worst_pony1: %s Why are you so mean to me?
ans_still_learning:
I'm sorry, I don't understand what you're saying, I'm still learning. 
Please don't be mad at me. %s
ans_cooldown_worst: %s Fine, I'm not talking to you anymore for a while.
ans_cooldown_love: I cannot handle this much love! %s
ans_cooldown_default:
Hello %s! My creator added a 1 minute cooldown to prevent my circuits from overheating. 
Please let me rest for a moment! %s
